trans-unit.source: Provides the design-time view that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Gir utformingen-visningen som er tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control represents a data source that calls methods of a business object in order to perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database-type operations.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen representerer en datakilde som kaller metoder for et objekt for business for å utføre Delete, Insert, velg og Update databasetypen operasjoner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>klassen gir støtte for utforming for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen i en visuelle utformeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An ObjectDesignerDataSourceView object provides members that indicate whether various database-type operations can be performed and that return schema and design-time data.
trans-unit.target: En ObjectDesignerDataSourceView-objektet har medlemmer som angir om ulike databasetypen operasjoner kan utføres, og som returnerer skjema-og utformingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanInsert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanDelete%2A> properties indicate whether the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control can perform the corresponding database-type operations.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanInsert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanDelete%2A>egenskapene angir om den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen kan utføre tilsvarende databasetypen operasjoner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanDelete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanInsert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanSort%2A> property, which is always `true`, indicates that the associated control can sort rows.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanSort%2A>egenskap, som er alltid `true`, indikerer at den tilknyttede kontrollen kan sortere rader.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanSort%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanPage%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> properties, which are always `false`, indicate that the associated control cannot perform server paging and cannot return the total number of rows in a query, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanPage%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>Egenskaper, som er alltid `false`, angi at den tilknyttede kontrollen kan ikke utføre server Bla og kan ikke returnere antall rader i en spørring henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.CanPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.Schema%2A> property gets a schema that describes the data source view that is represented by this view object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.Schema%2A>egenskapen henter et skjema som beskriver datakildevisningen som representeres av denne visningsobjekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.Schema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.GetDesignTimeData%2A> method generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.GetDesignTimeData%2A>metoden, utformingen data som samsvarer med skjemaet for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView.GetDesignTimeData%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView> class when requested by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>klasse når du ber om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>objekt som er knyttet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen i visual utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner"></xref> that owns this <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> som eier denne <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of this <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder navnet på dette <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated data source control as it is currently configured can perform a Delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilknyttede datakildekontrollen som den er konfigurert kan utføre en sletting.

trans-unit.source: The CanDelete property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control contains a value other than the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Returnerer CanDelete `true` hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen inneholder en annen verdi enn en tom streng ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> can perform a Delete operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> kan utføre en sletting; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated data source control as it is currently configured can perform an Insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilknyttede datakildekontrollen som den er konfigurert kan utføre en Insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The CanInsert property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control contains a value other than the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Returnerer CanInsert `true` hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen inneholder en annen verdi enn en tom streng ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> can perform an Insert operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> kan utføre en Insert-operasjonen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated data source control can perform server-based paging.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilknyttede datakildekontrollen kan utføre serverbasert Bla.

trans-unit.source: The CanPage property indicates that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls cannot perform server-based paging.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CanPage angir som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>Kontroller kan ikke utføre serverbasert Bla.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated data source control can return the total number of rows that are returned by a query.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilknyttede datakildekontrollen kan returnere antall rader som returneres av en spørring.

trans-unit.source: The CanRetrieveTotalRowCount property indicates that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls cannot return result-set row counts.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CanRetrieveTotalRowCount angir som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>Kontroller kan ikke returnere resultatsettet radantall.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated data source control can sort rows.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilknyttede datakildekontrollen kan sortere rader.

trans-unit.source: The CanSort property indicates that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls can sort result-set rows.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CanSort angir som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>Kontroller kan sortere resultatsettet rader.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SortParameterName%2A> property specifies the parameter in the collection that is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> property that is used to define the sort expression.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SortParameterName%2A>egenskapen angir parameteren i samlingen henviser til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>-egenskap som brukes til å definere Sorteringsuttrykket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SortParameterName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated data source control as it is currently configured can perform an Update operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilknyttede datakildekontrollen som den er konfigurert kan utføre en oppdateringsoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: The CanUpdate property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control contains a value other than the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Returnerer CanUpdate `true` hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen inneholder en annen verdi enn en tom streng ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> can perform an Update operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> kan utføre en oppdateringsoperasjon; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control.
trans-unit.target: Genererer utformingen data som samsvarer med skjemaet kontrollens tilknyttede datakilde.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeData method provides a design-time version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> view for use by the associated data-bound control designer.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetDesignTimeData gir en utformingen versjon av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>visning for bruk av den tilknyttede databundet kontroll utformeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: It is not expected that the designer will perform actual data access at design-time time.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke forventet at designer vil utføre faktiske datatilgang ved utformingen nå.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the designer creates sample data that matches the schema of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Det opprettes i stedet eksempeldata som stemmer overens med skjemaet for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: An integer containing the minimum number of rows to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som inneholder det minste antallet rader som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the data returned is sample data or real data.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om dataene returnerte er eksempeldata eller reelle data.

trans-unit.source: A sample of the data represented by the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the designer cannot generate any sample data.
trans-unit.target: Et utvalg av data som er representert av den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis designer ikke kan generere en eksempeldata.

trans-unit.source: Gets a schema that describes the data source view that is represented by this view object.
trans-unit.target: Henter et skjema som beskriver datakildevisningen som representeres av denne visningsobjekt.

trans-unit.source: The Schema property gets the schema tables from the associated designer.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen skjemaet henter tabellene skjemaet fra tilknyttede designer.

trans-unit.source: If any <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects are returned, the schema selects the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the same <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> property as this view object, or it selects the first <xref:System.Data.DataTable> if this view has no name.
trans-unit.target: Hvis noen <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objektene, skjemaet velger den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>med samme <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>egenskapen som denne visningsobjekt, eller den velger først <xref:System.Data.DataTable>Hvis denne visningen har ikke noe navn.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The Schema then creates and returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> object from the selected <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Skjemaet og deretter oppretter og returnerer et <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema>objekt av den valgte <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema>

trans-unit.source: This allows the designer of a data-bound control to provide relevant choices based on the design-time data source view that is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at utformeren av en databundet-kontroll for å angi relevante valg basert på utformingen datakildevisningen som er valgt for databinding.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"></xref> that describes the view and the properties of the objects in the list or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the schema is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"> </xref> som beskriver visningen og egenskaper for objekter i listen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis skjemaet er utilgjengelig.
